description:
Replace a lost cap on a Kleen Kanteen bottle.

  • Interchangeable with all Kanteen Classic bottles (internal threaded)
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Large bale loop dangles comfortably from your fingers, or from a carabiner on the side of your pack
  • Bale loop swivels out of the way, making it easier to toss in your bag
name: Klean Kanteen Loop Cap With Bale
